definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Sam says, "The landlord pays for the gas, but the tenant pays for all other utilities."
sentences.chinese: 山姆说，“房主付气费，租赁者付其他所有费用。”

sentences.english: As the market slumps, homeowners are taking action to stop the build-up of boards.
sentences.chinese: 随着市场的低迷，房主正在采取行动，制止集结板。

sentences.english: It is also used to subsidize loan modifications for troubled homeowners. .
sentences.chinese: 它同样用在了资助减轻陷入困境的房主的贷款上。

sentences.english: Obama has spoken broadly about boosting affordable housing and restoring public housing subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马主张为房主减负，并重新为公共住房提供补助。

sentences.english: But the most intrepid of the tiny house owners live in them full-time.
sentences.chinese: 但最勇敢的小房主住在其中全职工作。

sentences.english: What the Demise of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac Means for the Future of Homeownership?
sentences.chinese: 房利美和房地美的寿终正寝对房主的未来意味着什么？

sentences.english: Housing rental chain after a certain agency fees charged to the owner.
sentences.chinese: 房屋出租后连锁店向房主收取一定的代理费。

sentences.english: The owner asked the court for an order to distrain upon the furniture of the young man who failed to pay his rent.
sentences.chinese: 房主要求法院下令，扣押那个不付押金的青年的家具。

sentences.english: He made a statement about the householder's love of furniture.
sentences.chinese: 他就房主对家具的喜好作了说明。

sentences.english: Here the owner is called Liu Qing?
sentences.chinese: 这里的房主是叫刘清吗？

sentences.english: Coming in from the lane through the front door, one entered first the landlord's room.
sentences.chinese: 从前面的巷里踱进了那房子的门，便是房主的住房。

sentences.english: Such problems are often caused by the buck-passing between developers and owners.
sentences.chinese: 这类问题，往往造成开发商同房主之间互相扯皮。

sentences.english: India has two aspects--in one she is a householder, in the other a wandering ascetic.
sentences.chinese: 印度于我犹如房主，又如一段永无止境的漫长修行。

sentences.english: During the month or months for hotel expenses, all to be responsible homeowners.
sentences.chinese: 其间一个月或几个月旅馆费，全要房主负责。

sentences.english: ZhouMinZhi just and homeowners signed business contract, the beam will chase to the sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 周敏芝刚刚和房主签订了买卖合同，梁守业就追来了。

sentences.english: The owner may ask the court for an order to distrain upon the furniture of any person who fails to pay his rent.
sentences.chinese: 房主要求法院下令，扣押那个不付押金的青年的家具。

definition: property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
